players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Day 1 begins.

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Alice.
The villager Alice was found dead.
Beware, Charlie is the detective and discovered you're the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
Diana: "Alice was found dead. Let's investigate Bob and Charlie tonight."
Charlie: "Bob was investigated and is the mafioso. Watch him closely."
You: "Will watch Bob closely. Charlie revealed I'm mafioso."
Charlie: "Bob is mafioso. Watch him and Charlie closely."
Diana: "Will watch Bob and Charlie closely. Consider Charlie's role now."
You: "Will keep an eye on Bob and Charlie. Considering roles."

players.name: Charlie
memory: You're Charlie, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Alice was found dead.
You investigated Bob and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Beware, Bob knows you're the detective.
Day 1 begins.
Diana: "Alice was found dead. Let's investigate Bob and Charlie tonight."
You: "Bob was investigated and is the mafioso. Watch him closely."
Bob: "Will watch Bob closely. Charlie revealed I'm mafioso."
You: "Bob is mafioso. Watch him and Charlie closely."
Diana: "Will watch Bob and Charlie closely. Consider Charlie's role now."
Bob: "Will keep an eye on Bob and Charlie. Considering roles."
Votes: Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Bob, Diana voted for Bob
Bob was arrested
